title: crash
body:
This sh*t game always crashed...This is so annoying.Not because crash...BECAUSE I GOT LEAVERBUSTER FOR NOTHING!.....If game crash i do nothing so i restart my pc and when i want join back to game I GOT FKIN LEAVERBUSTER

TY RIOT! <3

replies.body:
>The Hungarian Boards is for those who speak Hungarian.
We can totally accept that you would like to express yourself in English or some other language, but most people here only understand Hungarian. Please use the [appropriate sub-forum](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en) as posting here in a foreign language could get your post deleted.

Please follow the rules.

---
"Nem in, hanem out"
[[GYIK és Szabályzat]](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/hu/c/altalanos-beszelgetes/0krXUB6R-a-farumok-szabaalyzata-aos-gyik) [[Fórumos Addonok]](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/hu/c/minden-egyeb/AehaAUjI-nemin-addonjainak-listaaja) [[Fórumos Discord Szerver]](https://discord.gg/M28bRuX)
It's hungarian board, please type hungarian.
